message: Let's start fair! I propose we split the money evenly.
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Let's compromise. I'll take a slightly smaller share, but I'm sure you can understand that the value of money is decreasing with each round.  We need to find a solution soon!
Each round is costing you more than me, let's settle this soon.
I'm willing to accept a smaller share than before, but we need to come to an agreement.  Each round hurts both of us, but I'm trying to be reasonable.
You're losing value fast, I'm being generous here.
I'm starting to feel the pressure of inflation, but I'm still trying to be fair. Let's find a middle ground before the value of the money drops even further.
Inflation is really hurting your share, I'm willing to take most of it now.
The value of the money is rapidly decreasing.  I'm trying to be realistic here, but if we don't agree soon, we'll both lose out big time.
I'm taking most of it, you're running out of time.
We're down to the wire!  I'm willing to take a very small share just to avoid losing everything. Let's settle this before it's too late.
Last chance, I'm taking almost everything.
